Author: daniel-cussen
Content: It's a decent domain name, but the $500 will do a lot more for your new startup than having a snazzy name.  Just come up with another one.

Content: Nice list.  I've read about 1/2 of them.  But IMO, the best one to start with would be "How to Get Rich" by Felix Dennis.
